resources.string: Hello world! This is an A Team app

string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: The fear of being boring is a great motivator.
My only regret is that I did not tell enough people to fuck off.
I\'m not searching for my other half because I\'m not a half.
I doubt vodka is the answer but itâ€™s worth a shot.
Do or do not, there is no try.
Who says you have to grow up?
There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
Life is like a box of chocolates.
If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
Curiosity is the lust of the mind.
I\'m not lazy, I\'m just on my energy saving mode.
I just passed my drug test. My dealer has some explaining to do.
Everything I like is either expensive, illegal, or doesn\'t text back.
You are not a product of those who cannot love you.
What a boobs. I\'ve never seen this type of beautiful boobs.
Clitoris? I\'ve never heard of that Pokemon.
Do emails get delivered on Sundays?
